guitar.name: Antonio Giuliani Acoustic Guitar Bundle (DN-1) - Dreadnought Guitar with Case, Strap, Strings and Accessories
guitar.description: The Antonio Giuliani Acoustic Guitar is a full-size dreadnought guitar made with high-quality materials. The guitar features a spruce top and mahogany back and sides, providing a rich, full-bodied sound. The guitar bundle includes a hardshell case, strap, strings and accessories, making it a great choice for beginner to intermediate players.
features: Spruce top and mahogany back and sides

guitar.name: Beginner 41" Cutaway Acoustic Guitar - Standard Full Size 6 String Dreadnought Natural Matte Finish w/ Gig Bag, Tuner, Steel Strings, Picks, Strap, Capo, For Beginners/Adults - Pyle PGA480NT
guitar.description: The Beginner 41" Cutaway Acoustic Guitar is a full-size dreadnought guitar designed for beginner to intermediate players. The guitar features a natural matte finish, steel strings, and a cutaway design, making it easy to play high notes. The bundle includes a gig bag, tuner, picks, strap, and capo, making it a great value.

guitar.name: Fender Squier Dreadnought Acoustic Guitar - Natural Bundle with Gig Bag, Tuner, Strap, Strings, Picks, Fender Play Online Lessons, and Austin Bazaar Instructional DVD
guitar.description: The Fender Squier Dreadnaught Guitar is a full-size steel-string acoustic that offers big sound at a small price. All-laminate construction with lindenwood top and mahogany back and sides. Scalloped "X"-bracing, mahogany neck and a durable dark-stained maple fingerboard. Slim, easy-to-play neck and full-bodied dreadnought tone. Bundle includes Gig Bag, Tuner, Strings, Strap, Picks, Fender Play Online Lessons, and Austin Bazaar Instructional DVD.
features: Lindenwood top and mahogany back and sides

guitar.name: Martin Steel String Backpacker Travel Guitar
guitar.description: The Martin Steel String Backpacker is a compact and lightweight travel guitar that's perfect for musicians on the go. It's made from high-quality materials and features a steel-string design for a bright and resonant sound. The compact size makes it easy to pack and transport, making it ideal for camping trips, road trips, and more.

guitar.name: Taylor Big Baby Taylor Acoustic Guitar
guitar.description: The Taylor Big Baby Taylor is a versatile and portable guitar that's perfect for players of all levels. It features a full-size body and a big sound, making it ideal for a wide range of musical styles. The guitar is made from high-quality materials and features a comfortable neck and easy-to-play action, making it a great choice for beginners and experienced players alike.

guitar.name: Yamaha FG800 Folk Acoustic Guitar
guitar.description: The Yamaha FG800 is a classic folk-style acoustic guitar that's perfect for players of all levels. It features a solid spruce top, nato back and sides, and a comfortable rosewood fingerboard for a warm and rich sound. The guitar is easy to play and features a classic look, making it ideal for folk, country, and other styles of music.

It features a solid spruce top and mahogany back and sides, as well as a cutaway design for easy access to the upper frets. The guitar also comes equipped with an onboard Fishman preamp system, making it easy to plug into an amplifier or PA system.
